content: @Eric Haas we're having trouble getting an admit notification bundle to pass fhir validation. The results from running the hapi validator against the ig example at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-alerts/Bundle-admit-notification-message-bundle-01.html are attached. admit-notification-validation-result.txt any advise? thanks
